metadata.name: Process Monitor Driver Creation By Non-Sysinternals Binary
metadata.comment: Detects creation of the Process Monitor driver by processes other than Process Monitor (procmon) itself.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\procmon')) AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.sys')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\procmon.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\procmon64.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects creation of the Process Monitor driver by processes other than Process Monitor (procmon) itself.

metadata.objective: False positive: Some false positives may occur with legitimate renamed process monitor binaries Reference: Internal Research
